comment: This book is perfect for absolute beginners!
Finally, I can understand the basic sentence structure.
The stories are interesting, but some vocabulary is a bit advanced.
A must-have for anyone taking the TOPIK I. The practice tests are very helpful.
Great for listening practice, but the pace is a little fast for me.
I love how practical the phrases are. I used them on my trip to Seoul!
Good for business context, but needs more examples for different industries.
My pronunciation has improved so much thanks to this book.
So many useful phrases for everyday conversations. Highly recommend!
I wish there were more examples for each idiom.
